scripts.build: npm run build-mono && npm run build-amis
scripts.build-mono: cd src/mono && dotnet publish -c Release -p:PublishSingleFile=true --runtime linux-x64 && cd ../..
scripts.build-amis: cd src/amis && dotnet publish -c Release -p:PublishSingleFile=true --runtime linux-x64 && cd ../..
scripts.clear: rm -rf src/node_modules && rm -rf cdk/cdk.out && rm -rf cdk/node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -f client/stack-data.json
scripts.all: npm run init && npm run build && npm run deploy && npm run demo && npm run destroy && npm run clear
